items.sentence: Tom wanted to eat at the small restaurant behind the hotel.
Tom wanted to give Mary something special for her birthday.
Tom wants a house with a big yard and a white picket fence.
Tom pointed to one of the pictures and said, "Who\'s that?"
I want to cut down on the time it takes to process records.
I want to go to Australia again before my passport expires.
I was never told that I was supposed to be at that meeting.
It started raining hard. Because of that, we played inside.
It would be a pity if you let this opportunity pass you by.
The other day I went fishing for the first time in my life.
